issue.title: [Plasma] Install libraries and headers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1230](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1230). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These are not being installed presently as part of `make install`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1230?focusedCommentId=16100517) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
